snippet: Max Scherzer struck out a Nationals-record 16 batters and threw a one-hitter, losing his perfect-game bid on a bloop single in the seventh inning.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Washington Nationals pitcher Max Scherzer strikes out record 16 batters and throws one-hitter in team's 4-0 win over Milwaukee Brewers; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Max Scherzer struck out a Nationals-record 16 batters and threw a one-hitter, losing his perfect-game bid on a bloop single in the seventh inning.

headline.main: Max Scherzer Flirts With Perfection, Striking Out 16 Along the Way
headline.print_headline: Scherzer Flirts With Perfection, Striking Out 16 Along the Way
